title: Enhancing fitness with WSN systems: From the laboratory to the market

author: Goran Rakočević, School of Electrical Engineering, University of Belgrade

segmentation: Hi everyone, I'm gonna report Rich and I'll be talking about possibilities for delivering wireless sensor network based systems to the market which are related to activities like personal fitness and exercise.

OK, so first I will be talking about smart running track which is a wireless sensor network based application which was developed during this project which I will use as an example on which I will talk about how to deliver this to the market.
Of course similar strategies can be used with other systems in the same domain.
In the end, I suppose the discussion will be during the break.
So.
General idea of a smart running track which is 11 developed by myself and Alexander.
17 It's the University of Belgrade.
Through this project is to have.
System of wireless sensor network notes.
That would support activity of what we used was simple running exercise around the track.
The system consists of a body area network which is deployed with the users with the runners and a system of sensors deployed around the track.
And the central server which processes the collected data so the body area network collects some vital parameter information.
What we implemented was an ECG.
Oximeter and we also had a pedometer, which is a device which sits on the hip and detects when a person takes a step.
The system which is deployed around the track can be used for monitoring things like environmental, temperate temperature, light intensity, humidity, etc.
So these parameters, these vital signs from person or all the persons around the track are collected their self to central server.
Over there we calculate the distance every person has covered a number of calories they burned.
The average speed, if they can, and we've been able to the system to give rankings according to several criteria.

So we can say the runners should run 10 laps and the winner is one who has the fastest lap or the winner is going to be the person who burns most calories in 10 minutes or other combinations are also possible.

Also, another thing is we've added an interface to mobile phones in this case, but other devices can also be used with the random square actually running so they can have online information gathered as they are exercising.
So this is the picture of accessories about the equipment that a single user would have equipped and the presentation was wireless sensor networks.
So well, there seems to be something very wrong with this picture.
And The thing is, this is an academic prototype and something that will be delivered to the market will look more like the second picture.
So all of the equipment will be integrated into clothing, either T shirts.
A glove, perhaps a pair of shorts.

Things like that is really this would be essentially if we want to have a sellable product because nobody is going to buy an exercise piece of equipment that requires him to be entangled in about a meter of wiring.
And the second thing is I've mentioned the sensor that we've implemented, but it should be fairly easy to add.
For example, a blood pressure monitor respiratory rate monitor.
EMG device for monitoring muscle activity so other things are also possible.
So how this can be solved or delivered to the market?
Well, there are several lanes that I see, probably something I didn't see.
One is the most obvious one.
Sell it as a support for personal fitness for individual users, perhaps advanced to people with advanced querying, too.
Advanced Fitness, perhaps some athletes, although not the high professional ones, they have much more expensive.
Equipment available already with similar possibilities.
So the system would be sold as an equipment with some amount of software.
It could have the ability to give.
User, say offline reports after this practice.
Perhaps some online ports as their practicing they could be used for.
Safety monitoring, so for example, if one's heart rate is going to buy, it can set him a warning to slow down, or it could be used for optimizing the performance routine.
Saying you can speed up a little or try a different exercise if you have muscle activities sensors you can see which muscles he may not be exercising and things like that.
So this is 1 general idea.

The second idea is something that's looks a bit more like the system that is developed actually, and that is a form of competitive running, so we have a group of people running around the track, and they're competing in terms of different criteria.

And when this this approach becomes very interesting is if instead of using, say, four or five individuals competing against each other, we look at teams of several people that competes against other teams, and where this becomes a good solution is for team building activities and why team building?
When if you think about general sports like or any other team building activity, taking a team of a well balanced team of engineers, economists, lawyers, whatever.
And you're taking them into a different environment, and in this different environment, another set of skills starts to matter, and so the team may become very imbalanced.
So for example, if we have a team of programmers and there is, well, let's say let's be politically correct and say an overweight person in the team and you're doing some sports activities.

If you're looking at shares sports performance, he's going to be underperforming, and this is going to cause problems within the team over a long period of time because he's going to feel like he's black theme down some people in the team may feel the same way.
But with a system like this using artificial criteria, you can use multiple different criteria and make the total score in a matter that would incorporate.
Different things which would then ensure that everybody has a very important part in the team score.

For example, if you give the example of told if you give points for simple for ways, then he would be incorporated would be contributing very much to the team and this is a system in which everybody can contribute.
How to market it?
Well, I mostly, city says.
A service type provision.
So you would create the whole environment track you would provide equipment and then you would charge big companies for the activities themselves.
The equipment can be also you can seek sponsorship allows the companies to put their logos on it so we can offset the costs of setting up the business.

And the third option I see for delivering this to the market is through or actually to making money off of systems like this is to use what was described by Sturgeon as the future Internet or the Internet of Things.
And this is a system in which basically everything can talk to everything and the idea is that if we think about the scenario one when you have a person who is running or exercising, jogging just.
On daily basis with a system like this, if we store the information gathered from him, we have.
What is a digital image of his level of fitness and how he responds to exercise and then we can use this in in ways of providing him with the service.

Basement using this data and if we think about how internets generally generally has progressed back in the 90s, it was everybody was wanting to go online providing as much information as possible, then as the Internet grew, focus shifted towards the search engine's and user interfaces, making the contents more available and easily more easily available to the users.
And in this last year, so we're starting to see a shift.
Store something that is more in terms of providing the users with as little information as possible, but still giving them the ability to make the decision they want to make.
'cause of the sheer volume of information we're getting swapped online and.
In a moment, I think it will be clear why I'm saying this and the best way to explain what they have in mind is to through an example.
So let's say I want to take an active quality and today I go online I do a search and I'll find the for example.
And.
A group of.
Professors and students are organizing a trip to Antigua.

And you have some numbers in terms of how many kilometers will be walking the day you have the inclination based basis, which will be walking and some other numbers which I don't really understand unless I do a little bit of research and then I have a sentence that says you should be reasonably fit if you want to come with us.
And so I will probably look at this sentence in the civil.
OK, I'm reasonably fit.
I can do this, but perhaps what I don't know is that the ad was written by Roman, who has built different idea about what is the reasonably fit when it comes to climbing.
Climbing a mountain than I do, so I could be in a lot of trouble in getting for a very bad time.
And if I have a system like this with my digital level of fitness stored in the computer, I can click on the button and say, OK, this is me.

Can I do this and then the computer can say sure this is OK, we can do this or this may not be the best solution, but there is a lovely chest or a meta tournament at Lake Bled which you might consider more of a active holiday.
So yeah, in a way I have.
I was given the opportunity to get the answer and without actually accessing the information about numbers and This is why says that this is the general direction.
I see Internet as a call going.
So.
And how exactly would this be delivered to the markets?
Well, there are several other options.
You can either sell the actual service software to.
Travel agencies if you don't set up on their own website, or you can create a portal.
On which the people can then go online and do a search.
For example, this is me.
I want to know about the Poly day in the Slovenian Alps.
Find something for him and then my personal preferences and my little level of fitness will be taken into account.
Perhaps even the my information can be compared to the other people who are already in the group, and I would get several options.
Since this is basically targeted advertising.

Maybe within the site level because today mostly targeted advertising relates to personal or personal preferences, but in here we can also take into account some things that user may not actually know about himself and that is how how fit he is.
In terms of precision, then numbers.

So another thing is, if you're going to go this way initially, there needs to be a base of users because it's highly unlikely that somebody is going to buy a system for exercising just so that once or twice a year he can get this answer about what quality he should take.
So we need to use other approaches.
For example, approach one or two most most probably approach one to get a certain base of customers, and once this.
Base exists then additional services will become economically viable.
Viable as the number of services offered.
Grows the number of customers.
Customers who drove.

Because now I'm not only getting the information about power power, power should run, I'm also getting some other things like like the Holidays and there are many other possibilities that can be taken into account and I generally think this is the way for the entire future.
Internet or Internet of Things Technology took to go in.
First we need base of users with based on.
The simple activities and simple scenarios and then more complex services will come as the.
Population that uses the technology grows.

OK, so and just before I end the presentation there is something that I would like to discuss and that is the matter of privacy and security which always comes up when dealing with vital parameters, personal information and things like.
This is how can I be sure that my information are not going to be stolen and abused in anyway and I don't think this is a political matter, so I'll do what any good politician will do.
I'll just pass the problem to somebody else and.
I really see that most of these concerns are targeted against big businesses and against governments.
And maybe we can talk about secure channels and decryption, encryption and.

These kinds of technologies, but really with the resources available on the other side, there is absolutely nothing we can do to say this is a secure system, even if I make a secure algorithm, can I be sure that the compiler is going to deliver this quote in exactly the way that I thought it would?

Perhaps the microprocessor has some additional hardware inside which is not supposed to be there, and really to address security and privacy pressure needed to go against the governments to be more transparent in what they're doing to give better control of big businesses and corporations.
And only then we can talk about encryption security, things like that.
We can perhaps protect you from the local teenagers, but not against the governments.
And so I'll conclude my presentation with this.
